title: Workshop on Designing Virtual Learning Environments (VLEs) Using a Constructivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen practitioners' capabilities in designing Virtual Learning Environments (VLEs) applicable to real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more principles of VLE content design reflecting constructivist learning theory.
Learners can develop five interactive activities that enhance learner engagement using imagination education techniques.
Learners can select blended media resources that address diverse learning styles (visual, auditory, kinesthetic).
Learners can propose two or more online discussion strategies that promote collaborative learning.

resources: Interactive Tools Trial Versions (Padlet, Mentimeter, etc.)
Case Analysis VLE (Virtual Learning Environment) Pilot Site

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
